title: Ricardo Pérez Castillo
text:
I am a Graduate Student in Statistics at UC Berkeley with a background in large-scale data engineering and consulting.
Previously, I was a Senior Software Delivery Analyst at McKinsey & Company and a Consulting Analyst at Deloitte, where I built ETL pipelines handling hundreds of millions of rows and designed data warehouse architectures.
My focus is on the intersection of robust data engineering and statistical inference. I enjoy building reproducible pipelines that enable advanced analytics.
